entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
